title: Roy of the Rovers: New Digs (7)
description: The smash-hit reboot of Roy of the Rovers returns for a third season of action, drama, heartbreak and world class football, drawn by beloved Roy artist David Sque!It's the start of a terrific new season for Melchester Rovers. They are now a Championship club with a new kit, new owners and a fabulous new stadium. With Sowerby now fully integrated into the club, Rocky and Roy Race couldn't be happier. But a personal tragedy and an appalling incident during a Melchester Rovers match in Europe, will push the footballing siblings to the limit.
author: Rob Williams
